title: How to Make Swiss Baked Eggs

steps.headline: Cover the bottom of the pan with Swiss cheese slices.
Break eggs and neatly add to pan.
Gently pour cream over egg mixture.
Serves between 3 to 6 people, depending on appetites.

text: Preheat oven to 350 to 375 °F (177 to 191 °C).  Melt butter in baking pan.  Cover the bottom of the pan with Swiss cheese slices.  Break eggs and neatly add to pan.  Season with salt and pepper.  Gently pour cream over egg mixture.  Bake until delicate brown.  Serve hot.  Serves between 3 to 6 people, depending on appetites.
